test.name: [union] unsupported attribute from no namespace

schema.message: The "foo" attribute (from no namespace) is not supported.

test.name: [union] unsupported attribute from XML 1.0 namespace

schema.message: The "foo" attribute (from http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace namespace) is not supported.

test.name: [union] unsupported attribute from other namespace

schema.message: The "bar" attribute (from http://example.org namespace) is not supported.

test.name: [union] node not white space neither comment

schema.message: The node is not allowed ("foo").

test.name: [union] foo child element is not supported

schema.message: The "foo" element (from no namespace) is unexpected, expected: "annotation" or "simpleType".

test.name: [union][attribute::id] Empty string

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: "" is an invalid ID.

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: "" is an invalid ID.

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: "foo bar" is an invalid ID.

test.name: [union][attribute::id] Starts with .

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: ".foo" is an invalid ID.

test.name: [union][attribute::id] Starts with -

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: "-foo" is an invalid ID.

test.name: [union][attribute::id] Contains invalid character

schema.message: The "id" attribute is invalid: "foo:bar" is an invalid ID.
